comment:
Cocoa nibs were ground...added to the mash ~1/2 way through (i.e., 30'), at the rate of 1/2 Cup.
O.G ~1.070

.2 oz anise + cold pressed coffee (light/medium roast Mexican & Nicaraguan brans ground coarsely and left with cold water in French press for 2 days) added at racking 5 days before bottling / kegging.
